Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to maintaining public data of open code violations in New York city housing authority developments
Summary: Relates to maintaining public data of open code violations in New York city housing authority developments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to New York city housing authority code violations
